abstract: Weinstein Company unveils agreement to produce and distribute television shows in partnership with American Media.
lead_paragraph: Weinstein is expanding its TV portfolio through a partnership with American Media, publisher of The National Enquirer, and Jupiter Entertainment.

headline.main: Weinstein Company Reaches Deal to Produce TV Shows
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Latest Weinstein Venture Will Focus on Reality TV

snippet: Weinstein is expanding its TV portfolio through a partnership with American Media, publisher of The National Enquirer, and Jupiter Entertainment.
